LanguageData.OE_Ghoul_KineticDrive.label: kinetic drive
LanguageData.OE_Ghoul_KineticDrive.description: Use the Crusader's Drive to saturate the bloodstream with volatile stimulants and synthetic adrenaline, permitting the ghoul to move and attack at incredible speeds for a short time, at the cost of rising metabolic strain.
LanguageData.OE_Ghoul_BastionDrive.label: bastion drive
LanguageData.OE_Ghoul_BastionDrive.description: Use the Crusader's Drive to saturate the bloodstream with protective catalysts and biochemical shields, making the ghoul more resistant to damage and fire, at the cost of rising metabolic strain.
